content: this is a vintage styled head band with ties around the head this pattern is perfect for knitters who have learned the basic knit and purl and want to advance in learning simple increase and decrease parts include the ties ribbing and main head piece are all adjustable afterthought the length i knitted originally put the ribbing parts under my hair if i tie the head band under my hair so you can t see them if you want the ribbing nearer your ears knit the head piece shorter shorter than 34cm also if you re not a beginner you can consider to duplicate stitch a ribbon or anything on your head band please tag me @madebym ka on instagram as i would love to see your finished work for a full tutorial please subscribe to my youtube channel and support me wink **2-1-2025** please download updated pdf for the correction on row 5
